name: Delete Master, Brain Puzzle
description:
Think you’re smart?
Then, join us and enjoy this happy & enjoyable Delete Master, Brain Puzzle game!
Download this popular brain game and use logic to solve fun and delete puzzles!

Easy gameplay, challenging brain teaser game!
Easy to play! Simply touch the screen and drag your finger to erase part of the drawing and see what's behind it.
The game may seem simple, but looks can be deceiving...
Make the most of your free time by playing an engaging brain game that will sharpen your wit. With a Delete Puzzle, you can chill out and get smarter at the same time! Level up your brain while you level up in the game!

Features of Delete Master, Brain Puzzle Game:
- The mechanics may be easy, but the puzzles will keep your brain guessing!
- Investigate hundreds of entertaining levels chock-full of tricky brain teasers. No two puzzles are the same! Each level stimulates your brain to approach a problem in a new way.
- Discover the unexpected twists hiding behind every image! Each stroke of your eraser will uncover a new, deeper layer to the story depicted in the drawing. Only you can make the invisible visible!
- Enjoy the delightful graphics with their unique cartoon style and cute animations.
- Provides hours of fun for teens, seniors, and anyone in between who wants to keep their brain sharp!
- The optional music, sound effects, and vibration settings give you more control over your gameplay experience.

But you’ll still have to think outside the box to master this brain game!
Who knew solving logic puzzles could be so enjoyable and satisfying?
Brainy and thinking games like the “Delete Master, Brain Puzzle” game bring you and your friends happy moments, puzzle master feelings.

Polish graphics & sounds:
- Immerse yourself in the Delete one part world of funny graphics and impressive animations.
- Simply erasing the parts is a magical way to play brain games
- Delete Master, Brain Puzzle games is a brain test for people who would love to challenge their IQ and drawing skill

Similarly,DOP Delete Stories: Erase Game is an exhilarating brain game that challenges players to solve mind-boggling puzzles by strategically deleting or erasing specific parts of various objects. With its captivating gameplay and cleverly designed levels, DOP guarantees hours of immersive entertainment for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages.

- Engaging Gameplay:
In DOP Delete Stories, players are presented with a wide array of intricate scenarios and objects. Their task is to examine each scene carefully, identify the unnecessary or obstructive parts, and use their eraser to remove them. The challenge lies in determining the correct sequence and timing to erase specific elements, as each level demands logical thinking and problem-solving skills.

- Brain-Teasing Challenges
Prepare to embark on a journey filled with brain-teasing challenges! DOP Delete Stories offers an ever-expanding collection of puzzles that gradually increase in complexity, providing players with a continuous sense of accomplishment. From simple shapes to intricate machinery, each level presents a unique test of logic and creativity.

- The Eraser Power
The eraser tool in DOP Delete Stories is your ultimate companion on this adventure. Use it wisely to delete one part of an object, unraveling hidden secrets or unlocking the path to success. Every swipe of the eraser brings you closer to solving the puzzle, but be careful not to erase the wrong part! Precision and strategic thinking are essential to triumph over each brain teaser.

With its intuitive controls and gradual difficulty curve, DOP Delete Stories ensures a smooth and satisfying gaming experience. As you conquer each level, unlock new chapters and discover increasingly complex puzzles.

DOP Delete Stories: Erase Game combines addictive gameplay, brain-teasing challenges, and captivating storytelling to deliver an exceptional puzzle-solving adventure!
